's finest tourist spot in Madurai corporation. It is situated 6 km from Madurai Goddess Meenakshi Amman Temple. Melamadai is located in the Madurai District and is under the administrative control of Madurai Corporation. The Melamadai Vandiyur Lake is the best place to admire the beauty of nature, the best season to view Melamadai Vandiyur Lake is October to January every year; Melamadai is also referred as "Wonder of city & village together."

The Melamadai Vandiyur Lake is the best place to admire the beauty of nature, the best season to view Melamadai Vandiyur Lake is October to January every year ; Melamadai is also referred as "Wonder of city & village together."
The closest airports to Melamadai is Madurai International Airport 18 km.

Nearest railway station is Madurai Railway Station at a distance of 10 km. From Madurai Railway Station, one has to travel only by road. Taxis are available for hire up to Melamadai there are other mode of transport here such as city bus, share auto, the prices are often not negotiable in share autos.

Straight buses are available from Madurai Railway Station to Melamadai as well, It takes around 15 minutes from Madurai Railway Station by bus.

, Melamadai is located at a distance of 10 km approximately and there are plenty of buses plying from various parts of the city.
